name: PresentationAvailability
description: A PresentationAvailability object is associated with available presentation displays and represents the presentation display availability for a presentation request. If the controlling user agent can monitor the list of available presentation displays in the background (without a pending request to start()), the PresentationAvailability object MUST be implemented in a controlling browsing context.

members.name: PresentationAvailability.value
members.description: A boolean value indicating whether the given presentation display is available. The value attribute MUST return the last value it was set to.

members.name: PresentationAvailability.onchange
members.description: Indicates that the availability of the presentation display has changed.
